mil3.3.8:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, yattha manoviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, phassopi vedanāpi tattha uppajjatī”ti?
mil3.3.8:1.3: “Āma, mahārāja, yattha manoviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, phassopi tattha uppajjati, vedanāpi tattha uppajjati, saññāpi tattha uppajjati, cetanāpi tattha uppajjati, vitakkopi tattha uppajjati, vicāropi tattha uppajjati, sabbepi phassappamukhā dhammā tattha uppajjantī”ti.
mil3.3.8:3.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṃ, tesu yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:3.3: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:3.4: Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:4.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṃ, tesu yathā eko pāṇi, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:4.3: Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:4.4: Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṃ, tesu yathā eko sammo, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:5.3: Yathā dutiyo sammo, evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.3.8:5.4: Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
